Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intel.jndn.management.types.Route
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Decodable

    public class Route
extends Object
implements Decodable
    Represent a Route object from /localhost/nfd/rib/list.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown
    See Also:
    RIB Dataset
